intro: Oenothera rostanskii, commonly known as the Rostanský's evening primrose, is a species native to Central Asia. It is a herbaceous plant characterized by its yellow flowers that bloom in the evening. The plant has lance-shaped leaves and produces capsules that contain numerous small seeds. It thrives in dry, sandy soils and is often found in steppe habitats. Oenothera rostanskii is part of the Onagraceae family, which includes other evening primrose species.
